[1] 78
MR_pav_agg |> 
  mutate(banch = "manual") |> 
  bind_rows(
    MR_data_toloka |> 
      mutate(banch = "toloka")
  ) %>% 
  mutate(level = factor(level, ordered = TRUE,
                        levels = c("easy", "medium", "hard"))) -> MR_full

MS_pav_agg |> 
  mutate(banch = "manual") |> 
  bind_rows(
    MS_data_toloka |> 
      mutate(banch = "toloka")
  ) %>% 
  mutate(level = factor(level, ordered = TRUE,
                        levels = c("easy", "medium", "hard"))) -> MS_full

ST_pav_agg |> 
  mutate(banch = "manual") |> 
  bind_rows(
    ST_data_toloka |> 
      mutate(banch = "toloka")
  ) %>% 
  mutate(level = factor(level, ordered = TRUE,
                        levels = c("easy", "medium", "hard"))) -> ST_full

NASATLX_pav |> 
  mutate(banch = "manual") |> 
  bind_rows(
    NASATLX_data_toloka |> 
      mutate(banch = "toloka")
  ) %>% 
  mutate(level = factor(level, ordered = TRUE,
                        levels = c("easy", "medium", "hard"))) -> NASATLX_full

SEQ_data_pav %>% 
  mutate(banch = "manual") %>% 
  bind_rows(
    SEQ_data_toloka %>% 
    mutate(banch = "toloka")
  ) %>% 
  mutate(level = factor(level, ordered = TRUE,
                        levels = c("easy", "medium", "hard"))) -> SEQ_full

Plotting

pd <- position_dodge(.3)
level_colors <- c("#4bd752", "#d7984b", "#d7524b")
task_colors <- c("red4", "green4", "blue4")

Mental Rotation

MR_full |> 
  ggplot() +
  stat_summary(aes(level, rt, color = banch),
               fun.data = mean_cl_boot, geom = "pointrange", 
               position = pd) +
  stat_summary(aes(level, rt),
               fun.data = mean_cl_boot, geom = "pointrange", 
               position = pd, color = "gray30") +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom") +
  labs(title = "Mental Rotation",
       subtitle = "Reaction time",
       x = "Difficulty level",
       y = "Reaction time (s)")

MR_full |> 
  ggplot() +
  stat_summary(aes(level, acc, color = banch),
               fun.data = mean_cl_boot, geom = "pointrange",
               position = pd) +
  stat_summary(aes(level, acc),
               fun.data = mean_cl_boot, geom = "pointrange", 
               position = pd, color = "gray30") +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom") +
  labs(title = "Mental Rotation",
       subtitle = "Accuracy",
       x = "Difficulty level",
       y = "Accuracy")

               position = pd) +

               fun.data = mean_cl_boot, geom = "pointrange", 
               position = pd, color = "gray30") +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom") +
  labs(title = "Memory Span",
       subtitle = "Reaction time",
       x = "Difficulty level",
       y = "Reaction time (s)")

NASA-TLX

NASATLX_full |> 
  ggplot() +
  stat_summary(aes(scale, score, color = level, shape = banch),
               fun.data = mean_cl_boot, geom = "pointrange", 
               position = pd) +
  stat_summary(aes(scale, score, color = level),
               fun.data = mean_cl_boot, geom = "pointrange", 
               position = pd, shape = 15) +
  facet_grid(task ~ .) +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom") +
  scale_color_manual(values = level_colors) +
  labs(title = "NASA-TLX",
       x = "Subscale",
       y = "Score (raw)")
Warning: Removed 17 rows containing non-finite values (`stat_summary()`).
Removed 17 rows containing non-finite values (`stat_summary()`).

Behavioral Data

MR_full %>% 
  bind_rows(MS_full, ST_full) -> behave_full
r2tof2 <- function(r2) r2 / (1 - r2)

Mental Rotation

mix_MR_rt <- lmer(rt ~ level + (1|id), 
               MR_full,
               contrasts = list(level="contr.treatment"))

NASA-TLX: GLMM scales

NASATLX_full |> 
  pivot_wider(values_from = score, names_from = scale) %>% 
  mutate(OW = ME + PH + TI + PE + EF + FR) -> NASATLX_wide

ME

mix_ME <- lmer(ME ~ task * level + (1|id), 
               NASATLX_wide,
               contrasts = list(level="contr.treatment"))
summary(mix_ME)
Linear mixed model fit by REML. t-tests use Satterthwaite's method [
lmerModLmerTest]
Formula: ME ~ task * level + (1 | id)
   Data: NASATLX_wide

REML criterion at convergence: 10291.9

Scaled residuals: 
    Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max 
-4.6972 -0.4117 -0.0179  0.4625  4.1646

 id       (Intercept) 775.5    27.85   
 Residual             193.4    13.91   
Number of obs: 1214, groups:  id, 135

Plots Raw Scales

NASATLX_wide |> 
  pivot_longer(cols = c("ME", "PH", "EF", "PE", "TI", "FR", "OW"),
               names_to = "scale", values_to = "raw_score") %>% 
  filter(scale != "OW") %>% 
  ggplot() + 
  stat_summary(aes(level, raw_score),
               fun.data = mean_cl_boot, geom = "errorbar", 
               width = .5,
               position = pd) +
  stat_summary(aes(level, raw_score),
               fun = mean, geom = "point",
               size = 2,
               position = pd) +
  facet_grid(task ~ scale, scales = "free_y") +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom") +
  scale_color_manual(values = level_colors) +
  labs(title = "NASA-TLX",
       x = "Difficulty Level",
       y = "Score (raw)")
Warning: Removed 17 rows containing non-finite values (`stat_summary()`).
Removed 17 rows containing non-finite values (`stat_summary()`).

NASATLX_wide |> 
  pivot_longer(cols = c("ME", "PH", "EF", "PE", "TI", "FR", "OW"),
               names_to = "scale", values_to = "raw_score") %>% 
  filter(scale == "OW") %>% 
  ggplot() + 
  stat_summary(aes(level, raw_score),
               fun.data = mean_cl_boot, geom = "errorbar", 
               width = .3,
               position = pd) +
  stat_summary(aes(level, raw_score),
               fun = mean, geom = "point",
               size = 2,
               position = pd) +
  facet_grid(task ~ scale, scales = "free_y") +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom") +
  scale_color_manual(values = level_colors) +
  labs(title = "NASA-TLX",
       x = "Difficulty Level",
       y = "Score (raw)")
Warning: Removed 17 rows containing non-finite values (`stat_summary()`).
Removed 17 rows containing non-finite values (`stat_summary()`).

NASA-TLX: GLMM Weighted Scales

WEIGHTS_data_toloka %>% 
  rename("scale" = choice,
         "task" = task_type) %>% 
  mutate(task = recode(task,
                       "mental_rotation" = "MR",
                       "sternberg" = "ST",
                       "mental_span" = "MS")) %>% 
  full_join(NASATLX_data_toloka,
            by = join_by(id, task, scale)) %>% 
  mutate(score_w = w * score) %>% 
  select(-c("n", "w", "score")) %>% 
  pivot_wider(values_from = score_w, names_from = scale) %>% 
  mutate(OW = ME + PH + TI + PE + EF + FR) -> NASATLX_weighted_toloka

ME

mix_ME_w <- lmer(ME ~ task * level + (1|id), 
               NASATLX_weighted_toloka,
               contrasts = list(level="contr.treatment"))
summary(mix_ME_w)
Linear mixed model fit by REML. t-tests use Satterthwaite's method [
lmerModLmerTest]
Formula: ME ~ task * level + (1 | id)

Plots Weighted Scales

NASATLX_weighted_toloka |> 
  mutate(level = factor(level, ordered = TRUE,
                        levels = c("easy", "medium", "hard"))) %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = c("ME", "PH", "EF", "PE", "TI", "FR", "OW"),
               names_to = "scale", values_to = "weighted_score") %>% 
  filter(scale != "OW") %>% 
  ggplot() + 
  stat_summary(aes(level, weighted_score),
               fun.data = mean_cl_boot, geom = "errorbar", 
               width = .5,
               position = pd) +
  stat_summary(aes(level, weighted_score),
               fun = mean, geom = "point",
               size = 2,
               position = pd) +
  facet_grid(task ~ scale, scales = "free_y") +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom") +
  scale_color_manual(values = level_colors) +
  labs(title = "NASA-TLX",
       x = "Difficulty Level",
       y = "Score (weighted)")
Warning: Removed 432 rows containing non-finite values (`stat_summary()`).
Removed 432 rows containing non-finite values (`stat_summary()`).

NASATLX_weighted_toloka |> 
  mutate(level = factor(level, ordered = TRUE,
                        levels = c("easy", "medium", "hard"))) %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = c("ME", "PH", "EF", "PE", "TI", "FR", "OW"),
               names_to = "scale", values_to = "weighted_score") %>% 
  filter(scale == "OW") %>% 
  ggplot() + 
  stat_summary(aes(level, weighted_score),
               fun.data = mean_cl_boot, geom = "errorbar", 
               width = .3,
               position = pd) +
  stat_summary(aes(level, weighted_score),
               fun = mean, geom = "point",
               size = 2,
               position = pd) +
  facet_grid(task ~ scale, scales = "free_y") +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom") +
  scale_color_manual(values = level_colors) +

       x = "Difficulty Level",
       y = "Score (weighted)")

Correlation Matrix

MR hard

corrplot::corrplot.mixed(
  cor(NASATLX_full %>% 
        filter(task == "MR" & level == "hard") %>% 
        select(scale, score, id) %>% 
        pivot_wider(names_from = scale, values_from = score) %>% 
        select(-id)
      )
)

        select(-id)
